description.en: Qiaofeng has always been single, and there are three problems that he cannot overcome: the first, being extremely handsome; the second, being fantastically rich; and the third, owning faultlessly high IQ. Legend has it that Qiaofeng has a very abnormal IQ test paper. And anyone who wants to be his girlfriend must get at least 60 points. However, perfectly avoiding all the correct answers and marking 0 in ten minutes, she actually becomes Qiaofeng's girlfriend... how does this happen...
